86274.summary: Some customers in Rossland are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
86274.title: Jan 27 - Rossland | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

86276.summary: Some customers in the West Point Grey area of Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
86276.title: Jan 27 - Vancouver (West Point Grey) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
